## 2. Install the Xbox App on Windows 11

The **Xbox app** is your central hub for everything Xbox on PC.

- Open the **Microsoft Store** on your Windows 11 device.
- Search for **Xbox** and install the official Xbox app.
- Once installed, sign in with your Microsoft account.

## 3. Explore Xbox Game Pass for PC

One of the easiest ways to get into gaming is through **Xbox Game Pass for PC**, a subscription service with access to hundreds of games across genres.

- Open the Xbox app and look for the **Game Pass** tab.
- Browse the library and install games directly to your PC.
- Enjoy features like **EA Play** access and day-one releases of Xbox Game Studios titles.

## 4. Connect Your Xbox Controller

For the best experience, pair an **Xbox Wireless Controller** with your Windows 11 PC.

## 6. Use Xbox Game Bar for Performance & Social Features

Windows 11 includes the **Xbox Game Bar**, a built-in tool for gamers. Press **Win + G** to open it.

- Monitor performance (CPU, GPU, RAM usage).
- Capture screenshots and record gameplay.
- Chat with Xbox friends or join parties.
- Control Spotify or other integrations while gaming.

If you also own an Xbox console, your games, progress, and achievements can sync across devices.

- Cloud saves are automatic with supported games.
- Start a game on your console, continue on your PC (and vice versa).
